page.title: 04THE YAIR HOUSE HISTORY
page.content: John Watson was the man who built the Yair House. The house is built at the foot of the Yair burn, but Gentlemen of the Yair and Fairnilee aided by the whole community pulled it down again. Thomas of the Yair was a thrilling merchant and had great dealings with the courts in Edinburgh. The Yair Estate The Yair Estate contains seven acres of land, there is a meadow, a pasture as well as the buildings. Mr. Thyne is the ownerr of the Estate, he is a printer in Edinburgh. On the Estate there are a number of people employed in occupations such as gamekeeper, gardner, housekeeper and cook.
